channel.title: Angry critics needed-2. Using different GuestOSs with Whonix Gateway
channel.description:
Another topic where angry critics are needed.
If I provide internet to Guest Operating Systems (Based on Other linuxes, or Windows) using the whonix internal adaptor, use them as workstations, what kind of dangerous situation may happen?
Thanks
